000 LOAD -M(101); JUMP+M(005, FST)
001 LOAD MQ,M(102); MUL M(100)
002 LOAD MQ; STOR M(102)
003 LOAD M(101);SUB M(103)
004 STOR M(101); JUMP(000)
005 JUMP(005, SND); NOP

000 021010F005
001 091020B100
002 0A00021102
003 0110106103
004 211010D000
005 0D00500000

100 000000003 #x
101 000000004 #n
102 000000001 #result
103 000000001 #constante
